name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Beach Resort Monterey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had really high expectations of this hotel as my partner had stayed here fifteen years ago and had waxed lyrical about the beautiful location so this was a highlight of our tour. Check-in was the longest we had experienced on our entire trip; granted that it was quite a busy time but if the Westin can get us through the door and into our room in under ten minutes how come it took half an hour here? Parking is ridiculous; I can understand that the hotel wants to deter the general public from parking by having a gated lot but why should hotel guests have to pay a surcharge of $10 to park at the hotel? Throughout our stay the barrier was up which nullified the whole point anyway. As another reviewer said here - get rid of the charge or include it in the bill! The room itself was really nice (inspite of our door constantly jamming so it had to be rammed open and shut all the time - sea air?); the i-pod dock was a nice touch. However, the big sell here is the magnificent view (I'd hate to stay here and not have the view!); being able to watch the sun going down over the ocean and falling asleep to the sound of the waves. A degree of romance that evening was recovered after the aforementioned problems and my having been told off in no uncertain terms for swearing loudly at the constantly jamming door!
reviews.title: A bit over-rated

reviews.text: I'd say that this hotel is in no way a beach resort, it's a Best Western with a fabulous view and at $200 a night (for a beach view) it's a hugely overpriced Best Western. Stay somewhere else and walk the beach to enjoy the views for free!
reviews.title: Great trip

reviews.text: I recently had a sisters weekend at this lovely hotel overlooking the ocean. On first entering the hotel there is a magnificent few of the ocean through floor to ceiling windows. It is quite spectacular. The staff was there to greet us and made sure our accomidations suited our needs. The rooms were very clean and the treated us to complimentary fruit plates that were beautifuly displayed.
reviews.title: Ok place to stay, nothing fancy

likes.disliked: — Dated room, guests leaving dog feces on the beach

reviews.text: We dinned at the restaurant for three meals. A breakfast, Lunch and Dinner. All three meals were delicious, well presented and the restaurant manager and staff were very attentive. We all felt very pampered and well looked after.
reviews.title: Paradise in Monterey
We had an excellent experience, We were treated like royalty
reviews.text: Housekeeping was outstanding. They didnt hurry us and they kept us well supplied and tidy. They also were very friendly.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The good: The service was great, the staff was really friendly and even upgraded our room to an ocean view for free! The location was pretty close to the sites. The view was awesome. Our room was right on the beach so we could take a walk on the beach starting right from our front door.
reviews.title: Great view!

reviews.text: The bad: Room decor was a bit out-dated if that bothers you, and the cable TV was snowy. Also, the walls are thin and we heard our neighbor cooing to her pet early in the morning.
reviews.title: Loved everything!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: We loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have come to the beach hotel many times and each time has been wonderful. I was greeted by staff that were happy and very helpful. I had dinner in the resturant and the food and staff were awesome. The hotel and resturant were clean. The service was prompt , the food was hot and we really enjoyed the beauitful view of the ocean. The rooms were clean. I love the remodling that has been done...the new windows and updated rooms are spectacular. We got to meet the GM, she came and asked us how our meal was. She was very pleasant and friendly. Usually at most hotels you never have the opportunity to meet the GM unless there is a problem.
reviews.title: It was great!

reviews.text: We can't wait for our next vacation. I will defentily book this hotel and stay here again.
reviews.title: Not worth the money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location in the Monterey area. Very scenic and price is affordable. Rooms are comfy and quite nice for the price. Desk personnel are not really friendly, but they get the job done. Skip the restaurant. Pricy and mediocre food, but the view in the evening is stunning. Be aware if the $11 parking feen and the resort fee. Also, ask for a AAA discount prior to booking otherwise they will not apply it.
reviews.title: GREAT location for the $

likes.disliked: — Check in desk were not too friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reviewers of this hotel raved about the ocean views and this hotel being right on the beach.
reviews.title: Really Bad Hotel

reviews.text: What they don't tell you is this is an old style hotel where there is a loggia in front of your room. We were on the third floor and really had a great view but had to keep our curtains closed as people walking by could look directly into our room as we changed clothes.
reviews.title: Want to be within earshot of crashing waves and barking sea lions?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the pictures it looked as if the rooms have balconies. This is not the case. That is the loggia in front of your room.
reviews.title: Beautiful Relax Beach Resort

reviews.text: The staff is good and the rooms are clean but it does not make-up for the really tiny room. With a price of $309 plus tax etc. we checked out after the first night.
reviews.title: Great Location, Great Food...........Awesome Rooms

likes.disliked: — Restaurant needs to be open more hours!

reviews.text: Booked an oceanfront room and it was spectacular! Well worth the extra money. This hotel is the ONLY one that is right on the beach and they are constructing a sea wall below the building but it did not cause us any problems. Lobby areas are very nicely decorated. Rooms are average size and comfortable, but you can't beat that ocean view and the sound of the waves. We ate at the hotel restaurant the first night. My husband's food was great, (Ahi Tuna Salad) mine was average at best (Shrimp Salad) I guess it depends on what you order. The second night we ordered a pizza (Greek Goddess) from room service and it was amazing! We both agreed one of the best we had ever tasted. I would stay here again without a doubt, if you like the beach, you'll love this.
reviews.title: Right on the beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Surf at your doorstep!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful ocean getaway. True there is construction on a new seawall but noise was minimal. The surf covered most construction noise. Seaside rooms so close to ocean you can throw a rock from the door and hit the water! Cafe Beach restaurant on top floor has very good food and service. The panaramic views of the bay were exceptional. During our trip we saw dolphins, sea lions, and sea otters swim close offshore. The room furnishings brought back memories of hawaiian motels....take note this is not a luxury hotel. Overall fantastic value for proximity to ocean, freeway access, and local attactions. We will return again as soon as possible.
reviews.title: On the beach but a bit tired

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night here. We chose the hotel because of the picture of its restaurant overlooking the ocean!!!
reviews.title: Pet friendly on the beach?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is more like a motel than a hotel. Easy enough to find but the decor is a bit tired. We noticed a water leak under our washbasin and the water had flowed out onto the floor. We reported this and someone came to see about it straight away. We were told there was no leak!!!!! So we just had to put a towel down on the floor so that we weren't standing in water to clean our teeth!! Room size OK but bathroom a bit cramped. We used the pool and got seats OK but if it was in the high season you could imagine it would be difficult to get a sunbed. The beach is literally right by the hotel. There was building work going on while we were there to repair the sea wall but this did not interfere with us.
reviews.title: Nickel & Dime You To Death

likes.disliked: — Nickel & dime you to extract as much money from you as they can.

aka: Best Western Plus Beach Resort Monterey Hotel
description: Monterey's only beach-front full service hotel, The Beach Resort Monterey boasts some of the most expansive views available of the Monterey Bay. Blending California beach casual with superior comfort and professionalism, the Beach Resort Monterey offers a relaxing alternative from the distractions of downtown, with the convenience of being only minutes away from the areas favorite attractions.
